thread.title: Amy Adams wants to join Jennifer Lawrence, Amy Schumer's boat party
thread.title_full: Amy Adams wants to join Jennifer Lawrence, Amy Schumer's boat party - Entertainment

author: IANS
title: Amy Adams wants to join Jennifer Lawrence, Amy Schumer's boat party
text:
Los Angeles: Actress Amy Adams says she would love to join Jennifer Lawrence and Amy Schumer on their next boat party.


Amy Adams. Pic/Santa Banta 
"I'm waiting for Jennifer Lawrence and Amy Schumer to invite me to their party!" the actress told hollywoodreporter.com.
"So, I hope I was funny today so they will invite me to their next boating party!
"I'm a little more neurotic than both of them, but I think that would be - they need a little of that, and they're both so cool and I could be the 'not-cool' person," she added.
Lawrence and Schumer became fast friends after they went jet skiing together in Hamptons earlier this year.
